brief_summary.textblock:
Retrospective analysis of data from patients with laryngeal contact granulomas in order to
      identify possible differences and/or similarities between the cases and in order to
      determine whether and which conclusions can be drawn on disease and therapy.

clinical_study.brief_title: Characterization of Laryngeal Contact Granulomas: Retrospective Analysis of Symptoms, Promotive Factors and Therapy

detailed_description.textblock:
This is a retrospective analysis of data from patients with laryngeal contact granulomas in
      order to identify possible differences and/or similarities between the cases and in order to
      determine whether and which conclusions can be drawn on disease and therapy.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria: Laryngeal contact granuloma in adults with documentation of symptoms,
        possible causes, therapy and outcome

        Exclusion criteria: Incomplete information on the diagnosis laryngeal contact granuloma
        (symptoms, promotive factors, findings)

study_pop.textblock: Former patients with laryngeal contact granuloma who were treated in this hospital.

clinical_study.keyword: Laryngeal contact granuloma, Treatment type, Outcome

facility.name: University Hospital Zurich, Division of Otorhinolaryngology

clinical_study.official_title: Characterization of Laryngeal Contact Granulomas: Retrospective Analysis of Symptoms, Promotive Factors and Therapy

overall_official.affiliation: University Hospital Zurich, Division of Otorhinolaryngology
overall_official.last_name: Jörg E. Bohlender, KD Dr. med.

primary_outcome.description: Data from patients with laryngeal contact granuloma are analyzed retrospectively as to wether similar pathologies and treatment lead to similar outcome.
primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients with similar therapy outcome as a measure of therapy predictability
primary_outcome.time_frame: 4 to 6 months after finishing the therapy

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Retrospective
